title: 14-year-old injured in shooting in South Baltimore
content:
A teenager was injured in the Brooklyn neighborhood of South Baltimore on Sunday night, police said.
The 14-year-old was shot in the back in the 3500 block of 4th St. around 9:16 p.m., police said. He was taken to a hospital for treatment.
Police had no more details on the incident.
In a separate incident, a 29-year-old man was injured in a shooting in the 3500 block of Reisterstown Road in the Park Circle neighborhood of Northwest Baltimore about 1:30 a.m. Sunday.
He was taken to an area hospital. Citywide Shooting detectives are investigating.
Anyone with information should call Citywide Shooting detectives at 410-396-2221 or the anonymous Metro Crime Stoppers tip line at 1-866-7LOCKUP.
